plugins.name: Textile
plugins.description:
About

Textile allows you to edit the texts of Figma layouts separately from Figma. In Google Sheets.


GitHub repository for plugin. For more details, see Textile documentation.


Pricing

Free version - 1 page per file.

Paid version - coming soon.


For other terms, write to we@eduhund.com.


Support

Support for plugin is provided at we@eduhund.com

accepted.name: Roman Nebel
accepted.description: IT Manager / UX Expert / Pet-projects Developer

plugins.tagline: Edit texts without opening Figma

plugins.name: Athlon TOC
plugins.description:
Navigate Your Figma Projects Like Never Before


A tool to streamline your design workflow. This powerful plugin automatically generates a detailed table of contents for your Figma files, making navigation through complex projects a breeze.


Features and Benefits:


Automatic Detection: The tool scans your Figma file and automatically identifies all sections and frames, organizing them into a clear, concise table of contents.


Clickable Links: Each entry in the table of contents is a clickable link, allowing you to jump directly to the relevant section or frame. No more scrolling through endless layers to find what you need!


Dynamic Updates: As your project evolves, rerunning the tool dynamically updates the table of contents to reflect changes, ensuring that you always have an up-to-date overview.


Vertical Auto-Layout: The table of contents is presented in a neatly organized vertical auto-layout frame, providing a clear and structured overview of your document.


Customizable Layout: While the tool takes care of the heavy lifting, you retain full control over the layout and presentation of your table of contents, ensuring it complements your design process.


Easy to Use:

Simply install the plugin, run it within your Figma file, and watch as it transforms your workflow, saving you time and effort.
plugins.tagline: Navigate with Ease: Instant Table of Contents for Your Figma Files

76257.tagline: Navigate with Ease: Instant Table of Contents for Your Figma Files

plugins.name: Stroke Shortcuts
plugins.description:
A tool for quickly adjusting stroke settings of Figma objects.


Key features:

• Increase/decrease stroke weight (+1/-1)

• Cycle stroke position inside/outside

• Apply to multiple selected objects at once


Streamline your design workflow and make stroke adjustments with ease.


---


Figmaオブジェクトのストローク設定を素早く調整するプラグインです。


主な機能：

• ストロークの太さを増減（+1/-1）

• ストロークの位置を内側/外側に切り替え

• 選択したオブジェクトに一括適用可能


デザインワークフローを効率化し、ストローク調整を簡単に行えます。
plugins.tagline: Stroke Control: A shortcut plugin for quick stroke weight and position adjustments

123723.name: Stroke Shortcuts
123723.description:
A tool for quickly adjusting stroke settings of Figma objects.


Key features:

• Increase/decrease stroke weight (+1/-1)

• Cycle stroke position inside/outside

• Apply to multiple selected objects at once


Streamline your design workflow and make stroke adjustments with ease.


---


Figmaオブジェクトのストローク設定を素早く調整するプラグインです。


主な機能：

• ストロークの太さを増減（+1/-1）

• ストロークの位置を内側/外側に切り替え

• 選択したオブジェクトに一括適用可能


デザインワークフローを効率化し、ストローク調整を簡単に行えます。
123723.tagline: Stroke Control: A shortcut plugin for quick stroke weight and position adjustments

plugins.name: CanvasJS Charts
plugins.description: This plugin lets you add CanvasJS charts into your Figma projects in just a few clicks. Simply provide the chart options as JSON and a frame name, and the plugin renders the chart and adds it as an image frame to your design.
plugins.tagline: Add CanvasJS charts to your Figma designs

110582.name: CanvasJS Charts
110582.description: This plugin lets you add CanvasJS charts into your Figma projects in just a few clicks. Simply provide the chart options as JSON and a frame name, and the plugin renders the chart and adds it as an image frame to your design.
110582.tagline: Add CanvasJS charts to your Figma designs

plugins.name: Contrast Checker
plugins.description:
Evaluate the contrast in your UI design according to the Contrast Success Criteria 1.4.3 and 1.4.6 of the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG).


Key Features:

  1. Instant Contrast Analysis: Quickly verify the contrast ratio between any text or element and its background for web accessibility.
  2. Accessibility Compliance: Ensure your designs are accessible to all users by meeting WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) standards.
  3. Intuitive Interface: Designed for simplicity and efficiency, providing a seamless workflow.


Why Choose Finlayer AI's Contrast Checker?

  1. Completely Free: No cost, perfect for freelancers, agencies, and in-house teams alike.
  2. Enhances Accessibility: Helps you design inclusive, ADA-compliant experiences for all users.
plugins.tagline: Turn high-quality designs into engaging and user-centric mobile experiences

104861.tagline: Turn high-quality designs into engaging and user-centric mobile experiences

plugins.name: Set Min/Max size
plugins.description:
This plugin is designed to manage and modify the sizing constraints of selected elements within auto layout frames or elements that are themselves auto layout frames.


Functionality:

  1. Setting min/max width or height
  2. Setting both min and max width or height simultaneously
  3. Setting all dimensions (min/max width and height)
  4. Removing min/max width or height constraints
  5. Removing all constraints
plugins.tagline: Instantly set min & max dimensions to multiple items

94912.name: Set Min/Max size
94912.description:
This plugin is designed to manage and modify the sizing constraints of selected elements within auto layout frames or elements that are themselves auto layout frames.


Functionality:

  1. Setting min/max width or height
  2. Setting both min and max width or height simultaneously
  3. Setting all dimensions (min/max width and height)
  4. Removing min/max width or height constraints
  5. Removing all constraints
94912.tagline: Instantly set min & max dimensions to multiple items

plugins.name: Knapsack
plugins.description:
Export Figma Vars in a format that can be imported into a Knapsack Workspace as Design Tokens and CSS. Collections & Modes are preserved and allow many theming possibilities in your design system's coded components.


  1. An existing Knapsack workspace is required
  2. Currently only export from Figma Vars to Knapsack Design Tokens is supported - with the other direction coming in a future update


For support, reach out to help at knapsack dot cloud

accepted.name: Knapsack
accepted.description: Knapsack is an enterprise-grade design system platform connecting design and code for teams of every size.

plugins.tagline: Synchronize Figma Vars with coded Design Tokens in Knapsack

123443.name: Knapsack
123443.description:

For support, reach out to help at knapsack dot cloud
123443.tagline: Synchronize Figma Vars with coded Design Tokens in Knapsack

plugins.name: Nong’s Cloud Line
plugins.description:
Usage:

You can convert the shape into a cloud line, or adjust the cloud line and click Update to update it to a perfect cloud line.

  1. Select the shape
  2. Enter the corresponding diameter
  3. Click Update


使用方式：

可以将形状转换成云线，也可以调整云线后，点击更新，更新成完美云线

  1. 选择形状
  2. 输入相应的直径
  3. 点击Update
plugins.tagline: Create Cloud Line

plugins.name: Samenamer
plugins.description: This Figma plugin allows you to select and color all frames on the current page that share the same name as the frame you have currently selected. After selecting a frame, the plugin will scan the page for other frames with the same name and select them automatically. The selected frames will then be colored red to make them stand out. This can be useful for quickly identifying and grouping related design elements within a Figma file.
plugins.tagline: same name frame similar names mark same frames

50442.name: Samenamer
50442.description: This Figma plugin allows you to select and color all frames on the current page that share the same name as the frame you have currently selected. After selecting a frame, the plugin will scan the page for other frames with the same name and select them automatically. The selected frames will then be colored red to make them stand out. This can be useful for quickly identifying and grouping related design elements within a Figma file.
50442.tagline: same name frame similar names mark same frames

plugins.name: X8 Content Machine
plugins.description:
Transforme seus carrosséis no Figma com inteligência, agilidade e personalização.


X8 Content Machine é um plugin inteligente que automatiza a inserção de textos, imagens e paletas de cores diretamente nos seus templates do Figma. Ideal para designers, social medias e equipes de marketing, ele permite montar carrosséis visualmente incríveis em poucos cliques.


⚙️ Funcionalidades principais:

  1. Aplicação automática de textos em múltiplos frames com organização por tópicos.
  2. Upload e ordenação de imagens com visualização numerada e arraste para reordenar.
  3. Paletas de cores personalizadas e pré-definidas, com suporte a edição e preview em tempo real.l.


🚀 Interface intuitiva com abas separadas para textos, imagens e cores.


🔁 Integração perfeita com o Figma, mantendo o fluxo de criação rápido e fluido.


💡 Perfeito para quem quer:

Ganhar tempo na criação de conteúdo visual.

Padronizar projetos com rapidez.

Automatizar a produção de artes para redes sociais.
plugins.tagline: Altere textos, imagens e cores de templates figma em alguns cliques

plugins.name: Dynamo
plugins.description:
Effortlessly increase design quality and accessibility


  1. Live preview Dynamic Type in real time
  2. Spot where text needs to wrap or truncate
  3. Add your scaled designs to the canvas with a click
  4. Saves you a ton of time


What's Dynamic Type?


Many users set a text size other than the default in order to read content more comfortably. Supporting Dynamic Type and larger text sizes is an important accessibility requirement. Dynamo scales text layers in your designs to test how they handle larger text sizes. Making it much easier to increase the quality, robustness, and inclusivity of your designs.


For best results


  1. Use auto layout in your designs so that layouts remain in tact once text layers have scaled
  2. To ignore a text layer, prepend its name with a period


Please leave comments and feedback below.

accepted.name: Mike
accepted.description:
Premium app design for startups.
Tools to level up designers.

plugins.tagline: Live Dynamic Type Preview

125441.name: Dynamo
125441.description:
Effortlessly increase design quality and accessibility


  1. Live preview Dynamic Type in real time
  2. Spot where text needs to wrap or truncate
  3. Add your scaled designs to the canvas with a click
  4. Saves you a ton of time


What's Dynamic Type?


Many users set a text size other than the default in order to read content more comfortably. Supporting Dynamic Type and larger text sizes is an important accessibility requirement. Dynamo scales text layers in your designs to test how they handle larger text sizes. Making it much easier to increase the quality, robustness, and inclusivity of your designs.


For best results


  1. Use auto layout in your designs so that layouts remain in tact once text layers have scaled
  2. To ignore a text layer, prepend its name with a period


Please leave comments and feedback below.

plugins.name: X-ray UI
plugins.description: Counts the number of screens, input fields and buttons in a user journey, given a selection of multiple frames. Matches the UI elements by a specific naming convention that can be customized, more components can be added as well such as radio buttons, checkboxes and textareas.
plugins.tagline: Count the number of screens, input fields and buttons

105525.name: X-ray UI
105525.description: Counts the number of screens, input fields and buttons in a user journey, given a selection of multiple frames. Matches the UI elements by a specific naming convention that can be customized, more components can be added as well such as radio buttons, checkboxes and textareas.
105525.release_notes: Added more UI elements to track: Radio, checkbox, slider
105525.tagline: Count the number of screens, input fields and buttons

plugins.name: GPT To I18n
plugins.description:
GptToI18n是一款非常实用的插件工具！它不仅能够轻松地的一键生成i18n，还可以将设计稿瞬间转化为多种语言版本，让您轻松应对全球市场。




一键生成i18n json。这意味着您可以在不需要编写任何代码的情况下，自动将设计稿翻译成其他语言。这不仅可以节省您的时间和精力，还能提高工作效率。




我们推荐在草稿状态下完成，您只需要按住 ctrl + p 打开GptToI18n插件，选择您需要转换的范围和目标语言，然后点击获取JSON，只需要等待几秒就能完成 i18n JSON生成。可以看到的 Text name 也做了对应处理。




如果您需要将设计稿转换成目标语言版本，您只需要点击根据 JSON 翻译页面即可。




一键将设计稿转化为各种语言的版本。无论您的客户在世界的哪个角落，他们只需要打开您的设计稿，就可以立即理解您的产品。




当然，如果您没有输入OpenAi API 密钥，获取对应 JSON 需要消耗 tokens ，如果您有自己的OpenAi API 密钥，那么您可以尽情的使用。




所以，如果您是一个善于尝试新工具的人，那么GptToi18n绝对是一个不容错过的好选择。它不仅可以帮助您节省时间和精力，提高工作效率，还可以让您的产品更轻松地走进全球市场。快来试试吧，让它为您的工作带来更多的便利和成功！


GptToI18n is a very useful plugin tool! Not only can it easily generate i18n with one click, but it can also instantly convert designs into multiple language versions, so that you can easily respond to the global market.


Generate i18n json in one click. This means that you can automatically translate your designs into other languages without having to write any code. This will not only save you time and effort, but also improve your productivity.


We recommend that you finish in draft state, you just need to hold down ctrl + p to open the GptToI18n plugin, select the scope and target language you want to convert, and then click Get JSON, only need to wait a few seconds to complete the i18n JSON generation. The Text name that can be seen is also processed.


If you need to convert your design to the target language version, just click Translate Page from JSON.


Convert design drafts into various languages with one click. No matter where your customers are in the world, they just need to open your design manuscript and instantly understand your product.


Of course, if you do not enter the OpenAi API key, it will cost tokens to get the corresponding JSON, and if you have your own OpenAi API key, then you can use it as much as you like.


So, if you are someone who is good at trying out new tools, then GptToi18n is definitely a good choice not to be missed. It can not only help you save time and effort, improve work efficiency, but also make it easier for your products to enter the global market. Give it a try and let it bring more convenience and success to your work!

所以，如果您是一个善于尝试新工具的人，那么GptToi18n绝对是一个不容错过的好选择。它不仅可以帮助您节省时间和精力，提高工作效率，还可以让您的产品更轻松地走进全球市场。快来试试吧，让它为您的工作带来更多的便利和成功！
94948.tagline: 生成i18n json，翻译设计，协同工作。Generate i18n json，Translate the design draft，Cooperative work

plugins.name: IcoSun
plugins.description:
What is Icosun?

Icosun is an open sourced replacement for Icomoon. Its a tool that allows you to convert SVG icons into web fonts. It ensures icons are scalable, accessible, and efficient for web and app development


What does the plugin export?

  1. Source SVGs - A folder containing all raw SVGs used to generate the font files. Ideal for mobile tech stacks that don't support font files as an icon input.
  2. JSON Unicode Map - A key-value mapping between icon names and the unicode values, making it easy to reference icons in your code.
  3. TypeScript Unicode Map - A TypeScript constant that maps SVGs to their unicode representations, allowing direct usage in TypeScript projects.
  4. Combined SVG - A merged single SVG file that links path data to the unicode values, providing a visual reference for your font set.
  5. Font Files - IcoSun generates all major font file formats, ensuring compatibility across different platforms. It outputs TTF, EOT, OTF, WOFF and WOFF2.


What makes IcoSun different?

  1. Duplicate Prevention - IcoSun detects duplicate icons and warns you before export, reducing manual errors in large icon sets.
  2. Simulate Output - SVG-to-font conversion often faces path-winding issues, leading to incorrect subtractions. With IcoSun, you can preview the final output inside Figma before exporting, minimizing unexpected rendering issues.


IcoSun is fully open source, feel free to make changes to the logic as you like 😀
plugins.tagline: Generet font file for your icon library

  4. Combined SVG - A merged single SVG file that links path data to the unicode values, providing a visual reference for your font set.

What makes IcoSun different?

plugins.name: Stash Modes
plugins.description: This plugin enables you to "stash" variable modes within your Figma file. A stashed mode is essentially a copy of an existing mode. Although it is not directly accessible for pages and frames, you can later swap it back as a "real" mode. This feature proves handy when you want to experiment with different settings while preserving your original modes.

plugins.name: Chroma UI
plugins.description:
Chroma UI revolutionizes color selection by combining the power of perceptually uniform OKLCH color space with an intuitive interface. Create stunning, accessible palettes that elevate your designs and streamline your workflow.


Create with Confidence

Make color decisions faster with intelligent tools that understand both aesthetics and accessibility. Every palette you generate comes with semantic color naming and WCAG-compliant text color recommendations, helping you build cohesive design systems that scale beautifully.


Professional-Grade Control

  1. Precisely adjust colors using the perceptually uniform OKLCH space, with familiar HEX, RGB, and HSL options
  2. Create smooth, mathematically accurate gradients that maintain consistent luminance
  3. Generate context-aware color names that adapt to your design system
  4. Ensure accessibility with automatic contrast checking and text color suggestions
  5. Export palettes directly to your design tools and documentation
  6. Spark inspiration with curated random palettes based on color theory principles


Essential For

🎨 Design Systems – Build scalable, consistent color foundations

🎯 Brand Identity – Craft memorable, on-brand color palettes

📦 UI Components – Ensure color harmony across your interfaces

📱 Digital Products – Create accessible, high-impact user experiences

💡 Creative Exploration – Experiment with unique, dynamic color schemes


Experience the next evolution in color tools. Chroma UI combines mathematical precision with designer-friendly workflows to help you create better color systems in less time.


Crafted for professional designers and teams who need scientific accuracy without sacrificing creative flexibility. Upgrade your color workflow today with Chroma UI.

accepted.name: Dēsigna
accepted.description: Dēsigna | Prōgramma | Gamēr | Builder | Crafting impactful experiences with seamless functionality.

plugins.tagline: Craft balanced, harmonious, and accessible color palettes for UI, gradients, and design systems.

plugins.name: FrameSwapper | Frame to Component
plugins.description:
✨Overview

FrameSwapper is a powerful Figma plugin that helps you replace multiple frames with the same name with a selected component. Perfect for design system implementation and large-scale design updates.


✨ Key Features

  1. 🔍 Smart frame detection: Automatically finds all frames with the same name
  2. 🖼️ Visual preview: Shows thumbnails of both frames and components
  3. ⚡ Batch replacement: Replace multiple frames at once
  4. 🎨 Component integrity: Maintains original component dimensions and properties
  5. 🔎 Search functionality: Quickly find components by name
  6. 📱 Clean UI: Modern, intuitive interface


🛠️ How It Works

  1. Select any frame in your design
  2. Click "Find Matching Frames" to detect similar frames
  3. Choose which frames to replace (or use "Select All")
  4. Pick a component from the available list
  5. Click "Replace" to transform your frames


💡 Use Cases

  1. Implementing design system components across multiple frames
  2. Updating old designs with new component versions
  3. Standardizing repeated elements across your design
  4. Converting prototype frames into component instances


🆕 Version 1.0.0 Updates

  1. Initial release with core functionality
  2. Smart component replacement system
  3. Visual preview system
  4. Search and filter capabilities
  5. Batch selection and replacement
  6. Modern, user-friendly interface


💡Resources & Links

📝 [Feedback Form](https://forms.gle/goMQSobvFav6Unjy9)


❤️Plugin & UXUI Designer

Cupi Ng

accepted.name: Cupi
accepted.description:
UXUI Designer, Etsy Seller, INTP
🌎 Life = Design + Tech + AI + Game
✨ Share what I know as a designer

plugins.tagline: Batch replace frames with components - Perfect for design system updates and UI handoff⚡

  1. 1000+ icons: this set has an icon for everything you need. We specifically chose the icons to work well in user interfaces.
  2. 3 weights: every icon can be added to your designs in 3 different weights, with stroke widths of 2px, 1.5px and 1px
  3. Sizes: Set your icons in different sizes, from the smallest size at 12 by 12 pixels to 64 by 64 pixels.
  4. Change colours: Ability to change the color of pasted icons, even to save your own custom colors to the plugin
  5. Keyword search: search icons not just by their name, but also by extensive extra keywords, to make it easier to find what you are looking for

plugins.name: Quick Rename
plugins.description:
Automatically renames frames and components in Figma based on their auto-layout properties. It helps designers maintain consistent and meaningful layer naming conventions, making it easier to understand the structure and purpose of elements in complex designs.


Key features


  1. Renames frames with auto-layout to "Column", "Row", or "Wrap" based on their layout mode
  2. Labels frames without auto-layout as "Container"
  3. Identifies frames containing text as "Content"
  4. Rename all shapes as "Vector"
  5. Preserves naming for component instances
  6. Reset text layers names


Benefits


  1. Saves time on manual renaming
  2. Improves file organization and readability
  3. Enhances collaboration by providing clear visual hierarchy
  4. Helps maintain consistency across design systems
  5. Makes it easier to identify and update layout structures
plugins.tagline: Essential keyboard shortcut to rename layers

100358.name: Quick Rename
100358.description:

plugins.name: Mots AI
plugins.description:
Elevate your UI designs with this intelligent Figma plugin that generates smart, context-aware text tailored to your needs. Powered by advanced AI technology, it streamlines your content creation process, allowing you to quickly produce engaging copy for various UI components.


Seamless Integration:


This plugin seamlessly integrates with your existing Figma workflow. Simply highlight the text area in your design that requires content, specify the context, and select the appropriate UI component. It will generate customized, realistic text that perfectly complements your design, saving you valuable time and effort.


Intuitive User Experience:


Designed with user-friendliness in mind, this plugin boasts an intuitive interface that allows designers to focus on their creative process. It currently supports English language generation, with plans to expand language support in future updates. The plugin adapts to your needs, making it an indispensable tool for designers seeking to streamline their workflow and boost productivity.


How to use this plugin:


Select text area:


Highlight the text layer or frame in your Figma design where you need content generated.


Provide context:


Specify the context of your design, such as the user story and acceptance criteria, to ensure the plugin generates relevant and appropriate text.


Choose UI component:


Select the specific UI component (e.g., button, link) for which you need text.


Generate and refine:


Let the plugin work its magic. Review the generated text and, if needed, refine it to achieve the perfect fit for your design.


—



Got more ideas?


Send them our way at contact@juny.com


www.juny.ai
plugins.tagline: Revolutionize your designs with AI-powered text generation

plugins.name: Page Forge
plugins.description:
Create templates for page names and apply them across all your projects.


Especially useful for teams with different types of projects or organizations.


How it works:

Create page templates.

  1. Name the pages in your project as you want them to be replicated throughout your document.
  2. Save the template to use it in other documents.


Apply the template.

  1. Create your document.
  2. Apply the template you want to use.


Export and import templates.

  1. Share your templates with your team.
  2. Import templates created by other users.


---

Documentation here: Documentation

Made by Eduardo Higareda
plugins.tagline: Uniform page names across all your documents

plugins.name: Color Code Extractor
plugins.description:
Color Code Extractor helps you identify and extract all color codes used in your selected Figma frames, making it easier to maintain design consistency and build design systems.


✨ FEATURES:


• Extract all color codes from selected frames, groups, or individual nodes


• View colors in a visual grid with hex codes for easy reference


• Copy any color code to clipboard with a single click


• Handles both fill and stroke colors automatically


• Supports opacity/alpha channel in color codes


• Works with multiple selections simultaneously


🎯 PERFECT FOR:


• Design system documentation


• Creating color palettes from existing designs


• Ensuring color consistency across projects


• Handoff to developers


• Auditing designs for color usage


Simply select any frame, group, or node in your design, run the plugin, and instantly see all colors used. No more manually inspecting elements or guessing which colors are being used where!


Color Code Extractor is lightweight, fast, and works entirely within Figma - no external services required.

plugins.tagline: Extract and copy all the color codes from your design with a single click

131051.name: Color Code Extractor
131051.description:
Color Code Extractor helps you identify and extract all color codes used in your selected Figma frames, making it easier to maintain design consistency and build design systems.


✨ FEATURES:


• Extract all color codes from selected frames, groups, or individual nodes


• View colors in a visual grid with hex codes for easy reference


• Copy any color code to clipboard with a single click


• Handles both fill and stroke colors automatically


• Supports opacity/alpha channel in color codes


• Works with multiple selections simultaneously


🎯 PERFECT FOR:


• Design system documentation


• Creating color palettes from existing designs


• Ensuring color consistency across projects


• Handoff to developers


• Auditing designs for color usage


Simply select any frame, group, or node in your design, run the plugin, and instantly see all colors used. No more manually inspecting elements or guessing which colors are being used where!


Color Code Extractor is lightweight, fast, and works entirely within Figma - no external services required.
131051.tagline: Extract and copy all the color codes from your design with a single click

plugins.name: AutoLayers
plugins.description:
AutoLayers is a powerful Figma plugin designed to simplify your design workflow by automatically renaming layers based on their type and frame layout mode. Whether you’re working with rectangles, text, or complex auto-layout frames, AutoLayers ensures your layers are consistently named and organized.


With support for multiple selected frames, this plugin helps you keep your Figma files tidy and easy to navigate, saving you time and effort on manual renaming.


AutoLayers ver1.0.2 by Kemonn98

Last Updated: September 9. 2024

muhsalmon.com
plugins.tagline: Streamline Your Design Workflow with AutoLayers

plugins.name: Writing Assistant
plugins.description:
The AI Writing tools for designers

It helps you refine your UX copywriting, make it more concise, friendly, and scannable using AI.

  1. Super easy to use, one click to refine the copywriting
  2. 5 variants in one request
  3. Modifications are adjustable from light to heavy


How does it works?

The AI writer will analyze and refine your original content from three metrics: concise, friendly, and scannable. Just one click, you will get the refined copywriting, the changes of score of these three metrics can help you make decision from those 5 refined variants.


Scientifically define good copywriting

The model is base on Microsoft style guide, thanks to the efforts of these talented designers, we are able to know how to evaluate a copywriting and how to improve it.
plugins.tagline: Refine your UX copy writing to make it more concise, friendly and scannable.

plugins.name: Figma to Celtra
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with the "Figma to Celtra" integration! Effortlessly import your stunning Figma designs into Celtra's design workspace and unlock the power of creative automation.


Key Features:

  1. Streamlined Workflow: Continue your pre-production processes and create conceptual designs in Figma, then drop them into Celtra with ease for a cohesive and efficient design experience.
  2. Efficient Importing: Easily transition your designs from Figma to Celtra using a simple copy and paste function. Whether you're working with single layers or multiple artboards, the process is quick and hassle-free.
  3. Layer Mapping: Experience seamless compatibility as all layer types from Figma are mapped to their corresponding layers in Celtra. Make configurations effortlessly for Images, Text, Shapes, and Groups right after you import.


Once your designs are in Celtra, take advantage of creative automation to scale your content across various sizes and design variations without missing a beat. Upgrade your design collaboration and scaling capabilities today by using "Figma to Celtra", and take the first step toward a more streamlined creative workflow.


Note that this plugin is compatible only with design files created in Celtra's Creative Automation platform.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Design Integration

131873.name: Figma to Celtra
131873.description:
Transform your design workflow with the "Figma to Celtra" integration! Effortlessly import your stunning Figma designs into Celtra's design workspace and unlock the power of creative automation.

  2. Efficient Importing: Easily transition your designs from Figma to Celtra using a simple copy and paste function. Whether you're working with single layers or multiple artboards, the process is quick and hassle-free.
  3. Layer Mapping: Experience seamless compatibility as all layer types from Figma are mapped to their corresponding layers in Celtra. Make configurations effortlessly for Images, Text, Shapes, and Groups right after you import.


Once your designs are in Celtra, take advantage of creative automation to scale your content across various sizes and design variations without missing a beat. Upgrade your design collaboration and scaling capabilities today by using "Figma to Celtra", and take the first step toward a more streamlined creative workflow.


Note that this plugin is compatible only with design files created in Celtra's Creative Automation platform.

plugins.name: It Counts Layers
plugins.description:
This plugin does one thing–it counts the layers in a Figma file. That's it.


The layer counts are broken down by page. It'll also count the number of layers in your selection. It doesn't do anything else.
plugins.tagline: That's what it does.

plugins.name: Slice Creator
plugins.description:
✂️ Slice Creator Plugin -- USE FOR EMAILS (KLAVIYO)

Easily split any selected element into even horizontal slices! Perfect for layouts, grids, or exporting assets. 🎉


How to Use 🚀

  1. Select a single element on your Figma canvas.
  2. Enter the number of slices in the plugin.
  3. Hit Create Slices to generate slices instantly!

Features ✨

  1. Quick, precise horizontal slicing.
  2. Auto-selects and zooms into the slices.
  3. Simple and seamless integration.

Limitations ⚠️

  1. Works with one element at a time.
  2. Only creates horizontal slices.

🎯 Perfect for efficient, consistent slicing!
plugins.tagline: Figma Plugin enables users to create evenly sliced sections of a selected element on the canvas.

113972.name: Slice Creator
113972.description:

  3. Hit Create Slices to generate slices instantly!

113972.release_notes: Can slice anything - Slices, Frames, ANYTHING
